mapper.select: /* MenuMapper.findMenuListByUserId 사용자 메뉴 조회 */ select m1.menu_id as menu_id , m1.menu_name as menu_name , m1.parent_id as parent_id , m1.order_index as order_index , m1.url as url , m1.icon as icon , m2.menu_id as sub_menu_id , m2.menu_name as sub_menu_name , m2.parent_id as sub_parent_id , m2.order_index as sub_order_index , m2.url as sub_url from menu m1 left join menu m2 on m1.menu_id = m2.parent_id left join menu_role mr on m1.menu_id = mr.menu_id left join `user` u on mr.role_id = u.role_id where m1.parent_id is null and u.user_id = #{userId} order by menu_id, order_index, sub_order_index
/* MenuMapper.getMenuByUrl URL로 조회 */ select menu_id , menu_name , parent_id , order_index , url from menu where url = #{url}
/* MenuMapper.getMenuByMenuId 메뉴아이디로 조회 */ select menu_id , menu_name , parent_id , order_index , url from menu where menu_id = #{menuId}
